oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Southern Confection Co. advertising card picturing Sam Johnson, ca. 1920
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Southern Confection Co. Factory Representatives, Knoxville, TN, advertising card, ca. 1920 (before 1923). Shows hand drawn figure with insert of photograph of Sam Johnson's head. Companies represented listed at bottom of card.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Southern Confection Co., advertisements, portraits, business enterprises, candy, salesmen
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
